fields.title: Refrigerant Full Charge Form
fields.description: This is a form for reporting full charge (or revisions to full charge) of a unit with 50 or more pounds of refrigerant. 82.157(l)(1)

fields.title: Refrigerant Maintenance Form
fields.description: This is a form for reporting each time an appliance with 50 or more pounds of refrigerant is maintained, serviced, repaired, or disposed of, when applicable. 82.157(l)(2)

fields.title: Refrigerant Leak Inspection Form
fields.description: This is a form for reporting refrigerant leak inspections. 82.157(l)(3)
